DONT-CHANGE-ANYTHING-IN-THIS-FILE: DONT CHANGE ANYTHING IN THIS FILE UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING
versionText: This is a topic branch. This rewrites the tools / scripts to use Rust instead of Javascript.

Rewrite the Deck Creator: Rewrite the Deck Creator in Rust.
Rewrite the Custom Card Creator: Rewrite the Custom Card Creator in Rust.
Rewrite the Vanilla Card Creator: Rewrite the Vanilla Card Creator in Rust.
Rewrite the Class Creator: Rewrite the Class Creator in Rust.
Rewrite the Breaking Change script: Rewrite the Breaking Change script in Rust.
Rewrite the Card Updater: Rewrite the Card Updater in Rust.
